subject: make .spec file Tizen compliant
commitMessage:
make .spec file Tizen compliant

- "System/Libraries" as group.
- %license for the LICENSE file.
- unversioned library package (removed %lname macro entirely)
- remove reference to original packaging bug tracker

comments.message: Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.
